StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLodgingInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode Integer, @FiscalYear Integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT --May be needed for insert/update records along with schoolCode, though PointOfContactID should be used pc.PointOfContactID, CampusContactID AS LodgingInfoID, cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, pc.En.tyTitle AS LodgingName, [Street1], [Street2],[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber], [FaxNumber], [EmailAddress], [Cost], City_Code AS CityCode, County_Code AS CountyCode, State_code AS StateCode
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CampusContact cc ON cc.PointOfContactID = pc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CollegePro.le cp ON cc.CollegePro.leID = cp.CollegePro.leID
WHERE cp.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear and pc.En.tyTypeID = 2
--ORDER BY cpr.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
